title: Bob.Omb's Win10PE x64 Bootable AIO Repair/Rescue USB v2.1
description:
========================================================= 
--- Bob.Omb's Modified Win10PEx64 --- 
========================================================= 
Release v2.1 (Win v1709) 3/21/18

First! This would not be possible without all the time 
dedication of the entire team over at TheOven.org! 

------------This Project is based on Win10PESE----------- 

Special thanks to ChrisR, JFX, and Lancelot.. 

And much respect to other releases as they are my 
motivation: Gandalf, Sergei Strelec 

========================================================= 

4 Easy Steps: 
Download/Unzip 
View Readme 
Burn With Rufus 
Prepare OSimages Folder 

========================================================= 

The PE was designed not only to maintain, but also to install 
XP/VISTA/7/8/8.1/10, provided that you prepair the drive 
your using by following the ReadMe.txt. You'll need to download 
and place the ISO's onto your drive, after burning it with Rufus. 

You can use this bootable USB to repair/backup/restore 
almost any modern computer, and most old ones too. 
(PC's/Mac's/Servers with RAID or ReFS volumes)

General Overview of Capabilities: 
Backup / Restore hard disks and partitions 
Convert Disks to VHD
Convert MBR(CSM-Legacy) to GPT(UEFI-SecureBoot) 
Test Hard Drives 
Certified Disk Destruction 
Ransomware File Decrypt
File Shredder
Telnet / SSH / FTP
Disk Defragmentation
Advanced Registry Tools
Debugging EXE and DLL files
Automatic System Backup
Disk Conversion 
WiFi Network Scanner 
Syskey Removal 
Duplicate File Removal 
Recover Lost Data on PC/Mac/Linux Drives 
Recover Product Keys and make Printable reports
Remove malware and viruses 
Install any Version of Windows 
ReFS Formatting, and Read/Write, for Revision 3.3 
Backup Drivers 
Remote connect to other machines -or- this drive from anywhere 
Reset Passwords(Unlock and switch Microsoft accounts to local accounts too!)
Decrypt password protected files
Works with and includes Apple drivers for most newer Apple computers
Java Support
DirectX 12 and FULL .NET Framwork 4.7.1

========================================================= 

*Many bugfixes in this version

Now you can add and save Start Menu shortcuts and Registry Keys easily
between boots and future versions.(2.1+) ReadMe's included in "Y:/System"

=========================================================
To connect to some network shares you will need to..

Map a network drive:

1.) Use the button to map a network drive at the top of the explorer window

2.) Make sure you select the checkbox for "Login with different credentials"
